full_summary:
**Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for On-Site Service and Preventative Maintenance of Waters Autopure System and G2 Synapt Mass Spectrometer**

**References**
* Solicitation Number: 5K003-6047786-001-CGC
* Publication Date: June 27, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 15, 2024, 15:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: August 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: July 31, 2027

**Summary**
The Canadian Grain Commission (CGC) invites qualified contractors to bid on a three-year contract for the provision of on-site service and preventative maintenance for Waters Autopure System and G2 Synapt Mass Spectrometer. The successful contractor will provide remote support, on-site service, and annual preventative maintenance for one (1) Autopure preparative Liquid Chromatograph (LC) system, one (1) G2 Synapt mass spectrometer, and two (2) software and computer hardware systems used to control the instruments and process data.

**Contract Requirements**

* Provide OEM-certified replacement parts (new parts only) and consumables for the specified equipment.
* Conduct preventative maintenance on the equipment in accordance with the OEM's defined maintenance procedures.
* Provide 72-hour on-site service standard for service calls.
* Offer unlimited software and PC support for the three (3) computer assets specified above.
* Ensure access to priority shipping of OEM parts within service standard, unless out of stock from the OEM.
* Commit to using OEM-approved parts for service and repairs only.

**Documentation Required**

* Written, authenticated copies of OEM certifications for providing maintenance on the specified equipment.
* List of required training completed to obtain these certifications.
* Defined maintenance procedure for each piece of equipment, per the OEM.
* Proof of authentication from the original equipment manufacturer.

**Bid Submission**

Bidders are required to submit their bids by email to bidreceiving-receptionsoumissions@grainscanada.gc.ca on or before July 15, 2024. All information Provided will be held in confidence, unless verification is required with the OEM.

**Trade Agreements**
This contract is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.

**Contact Information**
Marion Buhler, Procurement Specialist
Canadian Grain Commission
303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba
